It is #volunteersweek this week, #vasculitis UK would like to thank all the fundraisers who support VUK :-)  http://t.co/jAKFpliQsN
#vasculitis UK is run totally by #volunteers. Without them VUK would not be as it is today, so thank you :-)  http://t.co/3zWAR3OOIQ

#volunteerweek this week thank you to all those volunteers who give individual support to those who have #vasculitis  http://t.co/xvG1OfULEA
If the inflammation is on the big blood vessels, patients can die. Scary much. #vasculitis
Wahat else? Oh ya, different types of vasculitis causes different health issues. Mine causes skin irritation at the ankle area. #vasculitis
I'm currently on Beprosone cream and Dapsone pills, works as anti-inflammatory to treat the blood vessels n confused antibodies #vasculitis
It's a bit slow but so far it's showing some improvement on my skin. Slowly but surely #inshaallah #vasculitis
A more aggressive approach is using steroid pills, helps to control the confused antibodies. Fast results but costly effects. #vasculitis
Effects of steroid: increases appetite, long term is osteoporosis. So basically you'll be a fat person with bones issues. #vasculitis
It's also a fashion statement. Nelly had band-aid on his cheek, missy wears bandage on left ankle. #badass #vasculitis
Vasculitis is hot babe disease, medically certified that blood vessels are hot, so we're literally hot from inside. #syoksendiri #vasculitis
Dapsone meds has many side effects and so far, been through 3 different conditions every week. Insomnia, drowsiness and fatigue. #vasculitis
But body seemed to be adjusting well, so less side effects from Dapsone.  #vasculitis
Someone offered to wear a bandage at the left ankle as a sign of support. Alaaaaa...sweet pls! #retis #vasculitis
What else? Oh ya, support groups are available in UK, US and Canada. Awesome lah @vascuk @Vasculitis_CND @VasculitisFound #vasculitis
So everyday is a blessing, cutanoeus vasculitis isn't that bad. #vasculitis
Another common question, "how did u get it?" Nobody knows.... it's one of world's mystery. Hahaa over sangat pls! #dramaqueen #vasculitis
But seriously, doctors still can pin down what's the cause. It's kinda annoying but life goes on with proper treatment. #vasculitis
On my skin condition,many advise to avoid gatal food. It's not really related so no need for ill-informed advices pls. #rolleyes #vasculitis
Okla, that's all the tweet-a-thon on vasculitis for now. Or more like severe info-rrhea condition. #okbai #vasculitis

New classification of vasculitis Jennette el al. Arthritis Rheum 2012 #EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis
SVV can be divided into ANCA assoc vasculitis and Immune complex associated vasculitis eg antiGBM #EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis
New terminology WG ->GPA MPA CSS ->EPA ¬†#EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis
We are still not able to predict who will relapse after induction therapy #EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis
AAV Associated comorbidity : irreversible renal damage, CV disease, malignancy #EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis
A key question is how do you tail off remission therapy #EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis

WEGENT suggests for remission MTX=AZA
IMPROVE suggest AZA>MMF
#EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis

Steroid withdrawal is the most powerful association with relapse in AAV¬†
#EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis
MYCYC looks at MMF vs CYC for induction: at 18 m higher relapse rates in MMF PR3 group only #EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis

Rituximab is only drug licensed for induction (RAVE and RITUXVAS show IV CYC = RTX for efficacy and safety)¬†
#EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis
MAINRITSAN suggests that after IV CYC induction, fixed interval RTX better than AZA for maintenance #EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis
At 10y, 10% of patients develop malignancy on CYC (EUVAS) #EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis
Future trials will look at more steroid sparing regimens for induction and maintenance #EULAR2014 ^Jayne #vasculitis
#eular2014 Jayne #vasculitis. Worse prognosis in # rituximab treated patients if tubular involvment - T cell tubulitis.
#eular2014 Jayne#vasculitis. CYC and #rituximab are interchangeable treatment for #AAV in term of efficacy and adverse events
#eular2014 #vasculitis after 2 years of #rituximab maintenance, the time to relapse is doubled and 50% do not relapse after B cells recover
